==== With Ubuntu Bangladesh ====

* currently working as 'Liaison Person' of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BangladeshiTeam | Ubuntu Bangladesh]]</nowiki>.
* have been working as a enthusiast with Ubuntu Bangladesh since 2008.
* working with community event management team.
* also working with Bengali Localization team.
* co-ordinator of Ubuntu-BD documentation team.
* have been writing Ubuntu User Tutorials in Bengali. 
* working with Ubuntu-BD troubleshooting team
